Package natlang.rdg.documentplanner

Class Summary
BackgroundInformationSupplier The BackgroundInformationSupplier is responsible for adding background information to the document plan and adding necessary discourse markers.
BranchRemover This module removes long branches and splits them into smaller branches.
DocumentPlanner DocumentPlanner is the first component in the pipeline of the Narrator agent and consists of the InitialDocumentPlanBuilder, BackgroundInformationSupplier, StateTransformer and MoodCreator.
InitialDocPlanBuilder InitialDocumentPlanBuilder is the first component of the DocumentPlanner and is responsible for the conversion of the fabula in OWL format into an initial document plan
InitialDocPlanBuilderTester InitialDocumentPlanBuilder is the first component of the DocumentPlanner and is responsible for the conversion of the fabula in OWL format into an initial document plan This class is created for testing purposes, in order to check if the algorithm correctly builds larger structures than the Plop example.
MoodCreator The MoodCreator can be used to add sentences to the document plan which are only meant to create a mood and which do not have any important contents.
StateTransformer The StateTransformer decides how an internal state can be told best.
StoryReader StoryReader is the first component of the DocumentPlanner if the class StoryTester is used, and is responsible for the creation of an initial document plan based on the plot elements stored in test files.
